name: Tadpollision!
description:
This is a game about a very weird chaos theory.  Play with your tadpole popullation,  feed them with chemicals and help them reproduce, more tadpoles = theory proven(?)

Objective of the game: The objective of the game is to make the  ecosystem more chaotic, making the tadpoles out of control and get them collide with  each other more often, you have a "chaos meter" that is filled each time the tadpolles collide with each other.

You have abilities to control the population and behauvior of the tadpole ecosystem, using the purple droplets in the game you have the ability to duplicate the tadpoles around a certain area, using the yellow droplets block their path and restrain their position

Controls:

- Mouse Left Click: Select Water Droplet from the UI, And click again to put the dropplet in the tadpole ecosystem zone.
